body.name: SpeedTalk Mobile $5 Preloaded GSM SIM Card for 5G 4G LTE GPS Trackers for Pet Kids Senior Vehicle Car Activity Tracking Devices | 30 Days Wireless Service in The US with Canada & Mexico Roaming
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 mins
features: 50 Minutes & 100 SMS & 100MB Data are included in this plan for 30 days. Canada Mexico Roaming: 20 per Minute, 2 per SMS Text, 4/MB Data. SIM & Plan is compatible with 4G 5G LTE GSM GPS Trackers and Smart Watches. Our service will connect you to our SpeedTalk Network and will work within the United States Canada & Mexico.

Our SIM cards are designed for use in All Trackers, IoT devices, tablets, PCs, watches, pet trackers, security cameras, trail and game cameras for hunting, 4G routers, GPS devices, car locators, M2M Devices and more. This SIM kit is pre-cut in 3 sizes to fit any device: Standard, Micro and Nano sizes.

EASY ACTIVATION: Valid credit card is needed at activation, No contracts, Cancel anytime. Speedtalk Mobile offers its services through subscription plans. You can also call us for assistance 7 days a week LIVE CUSTOMER SUPPORT when you call our toll-free number.

No Activation Fee. No Credit Check. No Contract. You have the option to port-in (keep) your existing phone number or get a new number upon activation. Activate and manage your account with our Mobile App, available for iOS, Android and Desktop.
We have LIVE representatives ready to assist 365 days a year. Message us so we may assist you and provide you the best experience possible. We are available via phone, chat and messages.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our prepaid SIM card can be used with any unlocked 5G 4G LTE GSM device such as but not limited to: GPS TrackersGSM compatible GPS GPRS TrackersCar, Motorcycle and Bike TrackersSeniors, Kids, Adults and Personal GPS TrackersSpecial Needs GPS TrackersPet, Dog and Cat TrackersFleet TrackersMagnetic GPS Tracker for Vehicles and TrailersAsset TrackersSmall Portable GPS Tracking DeviceLone Worker TrackersAny Unlocked Cellular enabled GPS Trackers

Majority of GSM GPS trackers today uses cellular technology to remotely communicate with these devices. You will need a SIM card to enable tracking services to work and communicate with the tracker remotely via the phone number associated with the SIM card. Some use text messaging to locate the tracker, other devices use data connection. Either way, our service offer voice call, text and nationwide 5G/4G LTE Data. Our service will only work within the United States. * International Roaming is available with purchase of international Add-on. Check Coverage at STKMap To activate please visit us at ActivateSpeedTalk. NOTE: After SIM activation, it may take up to 24-hrs for the GPRS and data settings to sync and update with your device. Make sure you turned on the power of your device in an area with good signal reception. Enterprise, Corporate and Affiliate Accounts are available - online account management portal and API’s to manage multiple SIM cards within single account and one main airtime balance. SpeedTalk offers its services through subscription plans which auto-renew every 30 days. Service begins as soon as you activate your service. You'll be charged the rate stated at the time of purchase, every month, until you cancel. There is No Contract, Cancellations can be made any time by contacting customer support. A valid credit card is required to cover overages in case you exceed the applicable Voice, SMS and Data limits. To avoid overage charges, you should purchase the appropriate plan for your anticipated needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as it should

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The website listed in the activation directions is not even the correct website, but I was able to find the correct one thanks to Google. For some reason you have to give credit card info even though the card is preloaded. I followed the directions for use in a gps and there was absolutely no activity from the SIM card. It just doesn't work. Don't waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my GPS
reviews.reviewText: This product is exactly what i was looking for. I bought it to go in my GPS tracker device. It works perfectly. You have to dial the number to connect to the device. I installed it and it worked first time I tested it. Happy Happy Happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work on the GPS Tracker
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the gps tracker and the SIM card but the Sim card is supposed to go with any two G3 G or 4G type of device activated the Sim card it still does not work. It gives me an error message on the GPS tracker so therefore the Sim card does not work.

It looks to be like it would work well and the price was very well. So hope this helps. Gave it 4 stars cause I don't know how it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Called to activate
reviews.reviewText: I followed the instructions, called to activate. Process was quick and easy. Was online by the time I finished the phone call.
Everything went as expected even had great support from live chat which was really helpful

reviews.reviewTitle: Scam - Dont waste your money buying this sim card-doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: Dont waste your money with this sim card. Called Speedtalk for support - no answer (no local number}Emailed me back - told me to try with different phone.I tried 2 different phones - still no good ( no data).This is a joke - tried 4 hours to make it work - No luck.They knowing this sim does not work in Canada, and Amazon Canada also knowing this too.This is a scam and tricking people.

reviews.reviewTitle: LA fiabilité du produit et son utilisation pour le montant qu'on a payé.
reviews.reviewText: La carte SIM ne fonctionne pas. J'ai appelé le soutien de Speedtalk, ils m'ont aidé mais en vain. J'ai demandé le remboursement, ils m'ont dit que Amazon doit vous rembourser parce que vous n'avez pas acheté la carte chez Speedtalk . Alors J'ai désactivé la carte avec l'aide de Speedtalk , mais j'ai perdu 16$ parce que la carte n'est plus utilisable. Amazon dit que ce produit n'est pas remboursable !!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: WARNING ! DO NOT BUY IF YOU LIVE IN CANADA !
reviews.reviewText: Even though Amazon Canada has knowingly delivered this to you, a Canadian customer, and to a Canadian address, the product is useless, and cannot be activated from Canada. There is no mention of this in the product listing. You must live in the US and have a US address, and a cc registered to the same US address to activate. If you get suckered into buying this product, you have just flushed your money down toilet. Dint think you can return to Amazon for a credit, as this is a non-returnable product. Shame on Amazon for distributing a product on behalf of a seller who is knowingly selling a worthless product.
